Body: The Believers must (eventually) win through 2865
Those will be the heirs 2871
"In order that I may work righteousness in the things I neglected." "By no means! it is but a word he says before them is a Partition till the Day they are raised up. 2938 2939 2940
Then when the Trumpet is blown there will be no more relationships between them that day nor will one ask after another! 2941
Then those whose balance (of good deeds) is heavy they will attain salvation: 2942
But those whose balance is light will be those who have lost their souls; in Hell will they abide. 2943
The Fire will burn their faces and they will therein grin with their lips displaced. 2944

"Were not My Signs rehearsed to you and ye did but treat them as
			falsehoods?"
They will say: "Our Lord! our misfortune overwhelmed us and we became a people astray! 2945

"Our Lord! bring us out of this: if ever we return (to evil) then
			shall we be wrongdoers indeed!"
He will say: "Be ye driven into it (with ignominy)! and speak ye not to Me! 2946

"A part of My servants there was who used to pray `Our Lord! we
			believe; then do Thou forgive us and have mercy upon us: for Thou
			art the best of those Who show mercy!'
Who will inherit Paradise: they will dwell therein (forever).
"But ye treated them with ridicule so much so that (ridicule of) them made you forget My Message while ye were laughing at them! 2947

"I have rewarded them this day for their patience and constancy:
			they are indeed the ones that have achieved Bliss..."
He will say: "What number of years did ye stay on earth?" 2948
They will say: "We stayed a day or part of a day: but ask those who keep account." 2949
He will say: "Ye stayed not but a little if ye had only known!
"Did ye then think that We had created you in jest and that ye would not be brought back to Us (for account)?" 2950

Therefore exalted be Allah the King the Reality; there is no god
			but He the Lord of the Throne of Honor!
If anyone invokes besides Allah any other god he has no authority therefor; and his reckoning will be only with his Lord! And verily the Unbelievers will fail to win through! 2951 2952

So say: "O my Lord! grant thou forgiveness and mercy! for Thou
			art the Best of those who show mercy!"
Man We did create from a quintessence (of clay); 2872
Then We placed him as (a drop of) sperm in a place of rest firmly fixed; 2873

Then We made the sperm into a clot of congealed blood; then of that clot We made a (foetus) lump; then We made out of that lump bones and clothed the bones with flesh; then We developed out of it another creature: so blessed be Allah the Best to create! 2874
After that at length ye will die. 2875
Again on the Day of Judgment will ye be raised up.
And We have made above you seven tracts; and We are never unmindful of (Our) Creation. 2876 2877
And We send down water from the sky according to (due) measure and We cause it to soak in the soil; and We certainly are able to drain it off (with ease). 2878
With it We grow for you gardens of date-palms and vines: in them have ye abundant fruits: and of them ye eat (and have enjoyment) 2879
Those who humble themselves in their prayers; 2866
Also a tree springing out of Mount Sinai which produces oil and relish for those who use it for food. 2880

And in cattle (too) ye have an instructive example: from within their bodies We produce (milk) for you to drink; there are in them (besides) numerous (other) benefits for you; and of their (meat) ye eat; 2881
And on them as well as in ships ye ride.
(Further We sent a long line of prophets for your instruction.) We sent Noah to his people: he said "O my people! worship Allah! Ye have no other god but Him: will ye not fear (Him)?" 2882 2883 2884

The chiefs of the Unbelievers among his people said: "He is no more than a man like yourselves: his wish is to assert his superiority over you: if Allah had wished (to send messengers) He could have sent down angels: never did we hear such a thing (as he says) among our ancestors of old." 2885
(And some said:) "He is only a man possessed: wait (and have patience) with him for a time." 2886

(Noah) said: "O my Lord! help me: for that they accuse me of
			falsehood!"

So We inspired him (with this message): "Construct the Ark within Our sight and under Our guidance: then when comes Our command and the fountains of the earth gush forth take thou on board pairs of every species male and female and thy family except those of them against whom the Word has already gone forth: and address Me not in favor of the wrongdoers; for they shall be drowned (in the Flood). 2887 2888 2889 2890
And when thou hast embarked on the Ark thou and those with thee say: "Praise be to Allah Who has saved us from the people who do wrong." 2891
And say: "O my Lord! enable me to disembark with Thy blessing: for Thou art the Best to enable (us) to disembark." 2892
Who avoid vain talk;
Verily in this there are Signs (for men to understand); (thus) do We try (men). 2893
Then We raised after them another generation;
And We sent to them an apostle from among themselves (saying) "Worship Allah! ye have no other god but Him. Will ye not fear (Him)?" 2894

And the chiefs of his people who disbelieved and denied the
			Meeting in the Hereafter and on whom We had bestowed the good
			things of this life said: "He is no more than a man like
			yourselves; he eats of that of which ye eat and drinks of what ye
			drink.
"If ye obey a man like yourselves behold it is certain ye will be lost. 2895

"Does he promise that when ye die and become dust and bones ye
			shall be brought forth (again)?
"Far very far is that which ye are promised!
"There is nothing but our life in this world! We shall die and we live! But we shall never be raised up again! 2896
"He is only a man who invents a lie against Allah but we are not the ones to believe in him!" 2897
(The prophet) said: "O my Lord! help me: for that they accuse me of falsehood." 2898
Who are active in deeds of charity;
(Allah) said: "In but a little while they are sure to be sorry!" 2899
Then the Blast overtook them with justice and We made them as rubbish of dead leaves (floating on the stream of Time)! So away with the people who do wrong! 2900 2901
Then We raised after them other generations.
No people can hasten their term nor can they delay (it).

Then sent We Our apostles in succession: every time there came to a people their apostle they accused him of falsehood: so We made them follow each other (in punishment): We made them as a tale (that is told): so away with a people that will not believe! 2902
Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our Signs and authority manifest 2903

To Pharaoh and his Chiefs: but these behaved insolently: they
			were arrogant people.
They said: "Shall we believe in two men like ourselves? And their people are subject to us!" 2904

So they accused them of falsehood and they became of those who
			were destroyed.
And We gave Moses the Book in order that they might receive guidance. 2905
Who abstain from sex 2867
And We made the son of Mary and his mother as a Sign: We gave them both shelter on high ground affording rest and security and furnished with springs. 2906 2907
O ye apostles! enjoy (all) things good and pure and work righteousness: for I am well-acquainted with (all) that ye do. 2908
And verily this Brotherhood of yours is a single Brotherhood and I am your Lord and Cherisher: therefore fear Me (and no other). 2909
But people have cut off their affair (of unity) between them into sects: each party rejoices in that which is with itself. 2910
But leave them in their confused ignorance for a time.

Do they think that because We have granted them abundance of
			wealth and sons
We would hasten them on in every good? Nay they do not understand. 2911
Verily those who live in awe for fear of their Lord;
Those who believe in the Signs of their Lord;
Those who join not (in worship) partners with their Lord;
Except with those joined to them in the marriage bond or (the captives) whom their right hands possess for (in their case) they are free from blame 2868
And those who dispense their charity with their hearts full of fear because they will return to their Lord 2912

It is these who hasten in every good work and these who are
			foremost in them.
On no soul do We place a burden greater than it can bear: before Us is a record which clearly shows the truth: they will never be wronged. 2913 2914
But their hearts are in confused ignorance of this; and there are besides that deeds of theirs which they will (continue) to do 2915 2916

Until when We seize in Punishment those of them who received the
			good things of this world behold they will groan in supplication!

It will be said: "Groan not in supplication this day; for ye
			shall certainly not be helped by Us.

"My Signs used to be rehearsed to you but ye used to turn back on
			your heels
"In arrogance: talking nonsense about the (Qur'an) like one telling fables by night." 2917
Do they not ponder over the Word (of Allah) or has anything (new) come to them that did not come to their fathers of old? 2918
Or do they not recognize their Apostle that they deny him?
But those whose desires exceed those limits are transgressors

Or do they say "He is possessed"? Nay he has brought them the
			Truth but most of them hate the Truth.

If the Truth had been in accord with their desires truly the heavens and the earth and all beings therein would have been in confusion and corruption! Nay We have sent them their admonition but they turn away from their admonition. 2919
Or is it that thou askest them for some recompense? But the recompense of thy Lord is best: He is the Best of those who give sustenance. 2920
But verily thou callest them to the Straight Way;

And verily those who believe not in the Hereafter are deviating
			from that Way.
If We had mercy on them and removed the distress which is on them they would obstinately persist in their transgression wandering in distraction to and fro. 2921
We inflicted Punishment on them but they humbled not themselves to their Lord nor do they submissively entreat (Him)! 2922
Until We open on them a gate leading to a severe Punishment: then Lo! they will be plunged in despair therein! 2923
It is He Who has created for you (the faculties of) hearing sight feeling and understanding little thanks it is ye give! 2924

And He has multiplied you through the earth and to Him shall ye
			be gathered back.
Those who faithfully observe their trust and their covenants; 2869
It is He Who gives life and death and to Him (is due) the alternation of Night and Day: will ye not then understand? 2925
On the contrary they say things similar to what the ancients said. 2926

They say: "What! when we die and become dust and bones could we
			really be raised up again?

"Such things have been promised to us and to our fathers before!
			They are nothing but tales of the ancients!"

Say: "To whom belong the earth and all beings therein? (Say) if
			ye know!"
They will say "To Allah!" Say: "Yet will ye not receive admonition?" 2927
Say: "Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the Throne (of Glory) Supreme?" 2928
They will say "(They belong) to Allah." Say: "Will ye not then be filled with awe?" 2929

Say: "Who is it in whose hands is the governance of all things
			who protects (all) but is not protected (of any)? (Say) if ye
			know."
They will say "(It belongs) to Allah." Say: "Then how are ye deluded?" 2930
And who (strictly) guard their prayers 2870
We have sent them the Truth: but they indeed practice Falsehood!

No son did Allah beget nor is there any god along with Him: (if there were many gods) behold each god would have taken away what he had created and some would have lorded it over others! Glory to Allah (He is free) from the (sort of) things they attribute to Him! 2931
He knows what is hidden and what is open: too high is He for the partners they attribute to Him! 2932
Say: "O my Lord! if Thou wilt show me (in my lifetime) that which they are warned against 2933
"Then O my Lord! put me not amongst the people who do wrong!"

And We are certainly able to show thee (in fulfillment) that
			against which they are warned.
Repel evil with that which is best: We are well-acquainted with the things they say. 2934
And say: "O my Lord! I seek refuge with Thee from the suggestions of the Evil Ones; 2935

"And I seek refuge with Thee O my Lord! lest they should come
			near me."
(In Falsehood will they be) until when death comes to one of them he says: "O my Lord! send me back (to life) 2936 2937
